```{r setup}
library(pmsims)
library(pmsampsize)
set.seed(42)
```

```{r}
pmsampsize(type = "b",
           parameters = 10,
           prevalence = 0.2,
           cstatistic = 0.7,
           seed = 42)
```

```{r}
opts <- list(type = "binary",
             args = list(n_params = 10))

pmsims::calculate_sample_size2(
  data = opts,
  target_performance = 0.70,
  test_n = 1e4,
  tune_param = 0.7,
  min_sample_size = 100,
  max_sample_size = 3000,
  n_reps = 100,
  n_sample_sizes = 20
)
```
